Uses of Package
src

  • Classes in src used by src 
    Class Description
    AddEventDialog
    AddEventDialog is used to contain all panels for adding Event
    EditEventDialog.MainPanel
    MainPanel is used to contain all panels that needed to edit for Event
    EditEventDialog.TimeComboBox
    TimeComboBox is used to contains the JComboBox to select the time of the Event for editing Event.
    Event
    This class is used to create a Event object.
    LoginScreen.Password
    Password panel for password input
    LoginScreen.Username
    Username panel for username input
    MonthCell
    A MonthCell has all the information to display a month cell.
    MonthCellComponent
    MonthTableCellComponent extends JPanel to show all events inside a month cell.
    MonthTableModel
    MonthTableModel extends DefaultTableModel to be the table model for the month view.
    Profile.BaseDialog
    BaseDialog is used as the parent class for Profile.EditDialog and for Profile.PasswDialog so they will have the same setting for dialog.
    Profile.BasePanel
    BasePanel is used as the parent class for Profile.NameEditPanel, Profile.EmailEditPanel and Profile.PhoneEditPanel
    Profile.EditDialog
    EditDialog is used to contain the Profile.BasePanel and the Profile.BtnPanel
    Profile.PasswEditPanel
    PassWEditPanel is used to contain label and password field that needed to change the password of User
    SwingCalendar
    SwingCalendar extends JPanel, and is used to display the calendar, which can be shown in a JFrame.
    TimeComboBox
    TimeComboBox is used to contains the JComboBox to select the time of the Event.
    User
    This class is used to create a User object.
    WeekCell
    A WeekCell has all the information to display a week cell.
    WeekCellComponent
    A JPanel that show all the information for a week cell.
    WeekTableModel
    WeekTableModel extends DefaultTableModel to be the table model for the week view.
